verses.verse: This <WG3778> is the third <WG5154> time <WG5154> I am coming <WG2064> to you. Every <WG3956> fact <WG4487> is to be confirmed <WG2476> by the testimony <WG4750> of two <WG1417> or <WG2532> three <WG5140> witnesses. <WG3144>

I have previously <WG4275> said <WG4275> when <WG5613> present <WG3918> the second <WG1208> time, <WG1208> and though now <WG3568> absent <WG548> I say <WG4302> in advance <WG4302> to those <WG3588> who have sinned <WG4258> in the past <WG4258> and to all <WG3956> the rest <WG3062> as well, that if <WG1437> I come <WG2064> again, <WG3825> I will not spare <WG5339> [anyone,]
since <WG1893> you are seeking <WG2212> for proof <WG1382> of the Christ <WG5547> who speaks <WG2980> in me, and who <WG3739> is not weak <WG770> toward <WG1519> you, but mighty <WG1414> in you.

For indeed <WG2532> He was crucified <WG4717> because <WG1537> of weakness, <WG769> yet <WG235> He lives <WG2198> because <WG1537> of the power <WG1411> of God. <WG2316> For we also <WG2532> are weak <WG770> in Him, yet <WG235> we shall live <WG2198> with Him because <WG1537> of the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316> [directed] toward <WG1519> you.

Test <WG3985> yourselves <WG1438> [to see] if <WG1487> you are in the faith; <WG4102> examine <WG1381> yourselves! <WG1438> Or <WG2228> do you not recognize <WG1921> this about yourselves, <WG1438> that Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> is in you â€“ unless <WG1487> <WG3385> indeed you fail <WG96> the test <WG96>?
But I trust <WG1679> that you will realize <WG1097> that we ourselves <WG1473> do <WG1510> not fail <WG96> the test. <WG96>

Now <WG1161> we pray <WG2172> to God <WG2316> that you do <WG4160> no <WG3361> wrong; <WG2556> not that we ourselves <WG1473> may appear <WG5316> approved, <WG1384> but that you may do <WG4160> what <WG2570> is right, <WG2570> even <WG1161> though <WG5613> we should appear <WG1510> <WG5613> unapproved. <WG96>
For we can <WG1410> do nothing <WG3756> <WG5100> against <WG2596> the truth, <WG225> but [only] for the truth. <WG225>

For we rejoice <WG5463> when <WG3752> we ourselves <WG1473> are weak <WG770> but you are strong; <WG1415> this <WG3778> we also <WG2532> pray <WG2172> for, that you be made <WG2676> complete. <WG2676>

For this <WG3778> reason <WG1223> I am writing <WG1125> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> while absent, <WG548> in order <WG2443> that when present <WG3918> I may not use <WG5530> severity, <WG664> in accordance <WG2596> with the authority <WG1849> which <WG3739> the Lord <WG2962> gave <WG1325> me, for building <WG3619> up and not for tearing <WG2506> down. <WG2506>

Finally, <WG3062> brethren, <WG80> rejoice, <WG5463> be made <WG2675> complete, <WG2675> be comforted, <WG3870> be like-minded, live <WG1514> in peace; <WG1514> and the God <WG2316> of love <WG26> and peace <WG1515> shall be with you.
Greet <WG782> one <WG240> another <WG240> with a holy <WG40> kiss. <WG5370>
The grace <WG5485> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and the love <WG26> of God, <WG2316> and the fellowship <WG2842> of the Holy <WG40> Spirit, <WG4151> be with you all. <WG3956>
